mapper.sql: id, username, password, nickname, phone, email, job, address, type, provider_id, company_id, create_user, create_time, is_delete
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, username, password, nickname, phone, email, job, address, type, provider_id, company_id, create_user, create_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{providerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update sys_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
provider_id = #{providerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, provider_id = #{providerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select m.menu_id from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
